last_episode_to_air.name: The First Round Monkey
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's Leafs vs. Habs in Round 1 - as the NHL's oldest rivals face off in the playoffs for the first time in 42 years. The 1st place Toronto Maple Leafs enter the post-season with healthy line-up, but a very scary injury to Captain John Tavares puts a new lens on things. Wendel Clark visits Mike Foligno in Sudbury. The Leafs trade blows with the Canadiens in an intense 7-game series.

name: All or Nothing: Toronto Maple Leafs
original_name: All or Nothing: Toronto Maple Leafs
overview: The first of the All or Nothing franchise to follow an NHL team, the docu-series brings fans closer to the Toronto Maple Leafs organization than ever before, with cameras capturing every moment during the 104th NHL regular season and playoffs.

episodes.name: Playoff Habits
episodes.overview: The Leafs get off to great start, but head coach Sheldon Keefe wants the team to keep their focus on building Stanley Cup habits; to instill playoff-style values in the team's play from the get-go. Thornton breaks a rib. Matthews and Keefe have different thoughts about the team's strategy in Edmonton. A visit with Ema & Brian Matthews in Arizona.

episodes.name: The Pieces on the Board
episodes.overview: As they inch towards the halfway point of the season, Andersen, Campbell, Simmonds, Muzzin, and Matthews manage various injuries. Tavares works on his game, Mikheyev wants to up his ice-time, and Vesey looks to stabilize his place in the line-up. Meanwhile, Antonio the barber keeps the Leafs looking fresh inside the Covid bubble, and we visit with Kyle Dubas and his family.

episodes.name: Blue Swan
episodes.overview: As Covid ravages the North Division schedule, the Leafs double down their efforts to stay safe. Galchenyuk joins the team. Defense partners Muzzin and Holl do some off-ice bonding. While Freddie Andersen struggles , Jack Campbell chases down NHL history. Dubas & Co. prep for the trade deadline, which brings some exciting new pieces for the final stretch.

episodes.name: The Stretch Run
episodes.overview: With the playoffs just around the corner, Zach Bogosian sustains a shoulder injury, and Zach Hyman hurts his knee. Nick Foligno says goodbye to his family in Columbus, and hello to his new teammates in Toronto. As the Leafs chase the top seed in the North, Matthews chases the NHL's goal-scoring title. Nylander & friends get some R&R. The secret club in the Maple Leafs locker room is revealed!

episodes.name: The First Round Monkey
episodes.overview: It's Leafs vs. Habs in Round 1 - as the NHL's oldest rivals face off in the playoffs for the first time in 42 years. The 1st place Toronto Maple Leafs enter the post-season with healthy line-up, but a very scary injury to Captain John Tavares puts a new lens on things. Wendel Clark visits Mike Foligno in Sudbury. The Leafs trade blows with the Canadiens in an intense 7-game series.
